Title: Like Dandelion Dust
Writer: Stephen J. Rivele (screenplay), Michael Lachance (screenplay), Karen Kingsbury (novel)
Actors: Mira Sorvino, Barry Pepper, Cole Hauser, Kate Levering
Plot: A compelling drama that explores the different meanings of being a parent through the gritty, realistic lives of the struggling, blue-collar Porters, and the privileged Campbell family. ...
